dt: {bc}a holding of an estate or a mode of holding an estate
{bc}the temporary possession or occupancy of something (such as a house) that belongs to another
{bc}the period of a tenant's occupancy or possession

shortdef: a holding of an estate or a mode of holding an estate; specifically : the temporary possession or occupancy of something (such as a house) that belongs to another
the period of a tenant's occupancy or possession
